official_title: To amend the Goals 2000: Educate America Act to eliminate the National Education Standards and Improvement Council and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Goals 2000: Educate America Act to eliminate the National Education Standards and Improvement Council (the Council). Terminates funding for the Council. Makes technical and conforming amendments to the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 and the General Education Provisions Act.

titles.title: To amend the Goals 2000: Educate America Act to eliminate the National Education Standards and Improvement Council and for other purposes.
